products.title: Cinnamon Rolls
products.description: Pillowy-soft brioche rolled with a rich, spiced filling and topped with a luxurious cream cheese frosting.

products.title: Chocolate Walnut Biscotti
products.description: Crisp yet delicate chocolate biscuit studded with walnuts. An elegant accompaniment to tea or coffee!

products.title: Garlic Knots
products.description: These soft and buttery garlic rolls are "knot" your average dinner roll.

products.title: Blueberry Morning Bun
products.description: Delicate brioche filled with jammy blueberries and slightly sweet streusel. A refined breakfast treat.
